ygData.subject: RE: Werewolf Claw
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard so many werewolf stories those damn things have almost become mythical. =) ... From: Crysarra de Danann [mailto:lucretia_71@yahoo.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard so many werewolf stories those damn things have almost become
mythical. =)

-----Original Message-----
From: Crysarra de'Danann [mailto:lucretia_71@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 9:16 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Werewolf Claw


From: Crysarra de'Danann <lucretia_71@...>

let me add a bit here. Last night I was sitting..minding my own
business...right at the zone to qeynos..you know the place....right
next to that bug where you get bounced back to the hills when someone
is zoning at the same time as you....
anyway i am just sitting there medding and talking when out of nowhere
i get smacked by a werewolf!! there were several other ppl standing
close to me too so i think it spawned right there as i was sitting
there. so yeah...I think there is a spawn spot there. and as luck
would have it i have killed 3 werewolves ever and NONE of them ever
dropped a damn thing! worthless things they are :p

Crysarra
e'ci

--- Sheldon Jolson <Sheldon_Jolson@...> wrote:
>
>
> That is a separate spawn site. I don't know if it is static though
> there is a werewolf spawn in that area.
>
> From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
>
> I heard that the 2 bandits that sit in the middle of the path in wk
> are
> place holders for wearwolves...donno for a fact tho...

> VERY

> Werewolf
> > claw. Now being one that does not like to run around in the stupid
> West
> > Commonlands, or West Karana asking repetitively anyone have a
> werewolf on
> > tracking let me know! I got so bored and tired so I have decided to
> go to
> > Mistmoore and try to get to the dance floor. Now I have been to MM
> quite a
> > few times but I have never been inside the castle barely even down
> the ramp
> > towards the castle. mainly the Grave Yard and the zone line. Now I
> would
> > like some help on any suggestions or tips as to what to go or how
> to go
> > about getting to the Dance Room with the Gypsies/Werewolves....i.e.
> party
> > make up and level or a site where there might be a map. Thanks for
